GKFeatureMultiplayerGamingAllowed.description: Optional. Set to false to disable multiplayer gaming.

GKFeatureGameCenterAllowed.description: Optional. Set to false to disable Game Center.

GKFeatureAddingGameCenterFriendsAllowed.description: Optional. Set to false to disable adding Game Center friends.

PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

GKFeatureAccountModificationAllowed.description: Optional. Set to false to disable account modifications.

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
